name: Bitrise Webhooks Processor
description: Transforms various webhooks (GitHub, Bitbucket, Slack, ...) to bitrise.io's Build Trigger API format, and calls it to start a build.

RACK_ENV.description: To DEBUG / if you want to use SEND_REQUEST_TO set this to: development. Otherwise, if you want to send the trigger requests to bitrise.io, set/keep this as: production

SEND_REQUEST_TO.description: DEBUG: set a specific URL, where every request will be sent by the server, instead of sending the trigger requests to bitrise.io
